for tc in range(int(input())):
    (l, h) = map(int, input().split())
    s = input().split('1')
    s = [(len(s[i]), -i) for i in range(len(s))]
    s.sort()
    i0 = -1
    while len(s) > 0 and h > 0:
        (x, i) = s.pop()
        while len(s) > 0 and -i < i0:
            (x, i) = s.pop()
        h = 2 * (h - x)
        i0 = -i
    print('NO' if h > 0 else 'YES')
